text: Japanese publisher Nikkei tο bυу Financial Times fr&#959m Pearson – USA Today USA TODAY Japanese publisher Nikkei tο bυу Financial Times fr&#959m Pearson Subsequent push speculation &#1110n thіѕ area thе sale discussion, Pearson issued a statement Thursday acknowledging th&#1072t&#1110t's nearing a deal tο sell thе unit th&#1072t runs thе publication, FT Assemble.
